title: Colby: Adventures of a Rescued Puppy
description: It's bedtime, and Ava does not want her father reading another story. Instead, she asks him to tell her stories about his childhood. So, without hesitation, Rob begins sharing tales of his family's beloved pet, Colby. Drawn from memories of his youth, Ava's dad reminisces about how a newly rescued Husky-mixed puppy entered their lives and melted their hearts. The tales of young Colby and his antics leave Ava begging to hear more.
author: Shanley Mahsay
